articles.title: Scoot flight bound for Singapore turned back to Perth after technical fault: Reports - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: A Scoot flight headed to Singapore from Perth was forced to turn back shortly after take-off on Monday night (Jul 11) due to a technical fault. The fault was discovered about 20 minutes after the plane took off from Perth at 7.40pm, said Scoot in r…
articles.content:
There was a technical fault with the aircraft, a Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner, said Scoot.
"A decision was then made to return to Perth. As the required spares must be uplifted to Perth, TR009 could not … [+732 chars]
